checklistItems.lineItemDescription: Name clearance form
Valid CDD in place, or exemption obtained, prior to issuance/drawdown.
PDR/ Conflicts Clearance approval / updates / closure via Workbench
Compliance Approval via Workbench for Onshore/Offshore Pre-Screening (only for deals with linkages to China, India, Indonesia, Korea and Taiwan)
2-year broad-based relationship exemption approval (if applicable)
Secured project folder created
Project distribution list created
Debt Commitment Committee Approval / Notification  (if applicable)
Underwriting Committee approval obtained (if applicable)
Completed Volcker questionnaire

Is a Client ESRA held, and (where required) a Transaction ESRA held? Have any issues identified in Client / Transaction ESRA been flagged to the approver /  approving committee (e.g. DCC / UWC), and reflected in the prospectus as appropriate?
Sign off from FCC in the case of PEP and sanction countries / entities / issues identified (where applicable)

checklistSections.sectionDescription: Client Engagement, Due Diligence and Execution

checklistItems.lineItemDescription: RFP Response / Indicative Term Sheet / Proposal to client (if any)
Signed NDAs (with client) / Mandate Letter / Backstop Letter/ Underwriting Letter (if any)
Working party list (if any)
Background checks / investigative due diligence conducted
Record of the dates, venue, times of and participants in each due diligence ("DD") meeting/call
Copy of all relevant DD questionnaires  (for eg. management DD, auditor DD, bring down DD, sanctions DD (if any), etc)
Copy of any file notes on specific DD issues (if any)
Any other regulatory approval / correspondence (if any)
Bloomberg Transaction Announcement, if any
Final written (or email) approval / correspondences from external legal counsel in relation to Bloomberg Transaction Announcement
Confirmation from lawyers or agent that Conditions Precedent have been satisfied
Issuer/Guarantor/Key Borrower is Listed in the UK/EEA
PoAs executed by Senior SCB PoA Holder (if any)
Final Order Book (including Syndicate comments/rationale against some specific allocations)
Issuer's consent on final allocations (one way notification is sufficient)
Names of Maker and Checker on final allocations in an email from Bond Syndicate
Market Sounding Conducted
Wall crossing approval for the personnel conducting the market sounding
Wall crossing approval for investors (for hard sounding only)
Sounding script (for hard sounding only) and Compliance's approval of the script
Market Sounding log- CM To confirm on this question
Non Disclosure Agreement signed by investors for hard sounding
Pre-Deal Research
Wall crossing correspondence / script
Research guideline and approvals / guidance from CM Compliance and / or external counsel
Final pre-deal research report
Distribution list of the pre-deal research report
Roadshow (Deal/ Non-Deal)
Non-Deal Roadshow cooling off period observed, if any
Roadshow clearance from Compliance if:
-       Chaperoning required?
-       Licensing required?
Roadshow itinerary (if any)
Roadshow presentation ( if any)
US SEC-Registered Deal
Bona fide Selling Effort Confirmation
Regional CM Head approval
Master Agreement Among Underwriter ("MAAU") and Invite Wire(s) to the extent received
Where an MAAU is used, confirmation of no exceptions to FINRA Questionnaire
Does the selling and distribution section of the offering document contain the best practice language
Contingent Convertible Bonds (CoCo/ CoCo Like) transaction For US SEC registered co-manager CoCo / CoCo-like transactions
For Non-US SEC registered co-manager CoCo / CoCo-like transactions, deal teams should perform “reasonable steps”
Legal Sign-offs (where applicable)
Offering Circular / Information Memorandum (if any)
Rating report (if any)
Final Case Study (if any)
Transaction/Deal Bible/Executed Documents
Deal status and details have been updated in Deal Centre in Workbench upon completion
Fee Booking Form
Public Deal Announcement by client (if any)
Client consent has been obtained for use of client name/logo in deal tombstone public advertisements, awards pitches, marketing materials
